data.question: What is the crystal system of as-synthesized kgmSMe (State I)?
What method was used for the exfoliation of layered MOFs?
data.answer: Gentle stirring of a MeTHF (1 mg/mL) suspension of bilayer-expanded kgmSMe (State II) at 20 °C for 24 h.

data.question: Does the synthesis of kgmSMe involve the use of pyridine?
What is the space group of as-synthesized kgmOMe (State I)?
What is the temperature used during the single crystal X-ray diffractometry of as-synthesized kgmSMe (State I)?
Is the interlayer distance of kgmSMe in the bilayer-expanded state (State II) longer than in the as-synthesized state (State I)?
What is the density (calculated) of as-synthesized kgmSMe (State I)?
What solvent was used for the synthesis of kgmSMe?
Does the exfoliation process of kgmSMe into nanosheets require the use of surfactants?
What is the method used to prepare samples for TEM analysis?
data.answer: Dropping 10 µL of kgmSMe dispersions on a copper-supported ultrathin carbon film and drying in air.

data.question: What is the role of iodomethane in the synthesis of 5-methylthioisophthalic acid (SMe-H2ip)?
data.answer: It is used in the methylation step.

data.question: Is the kgmSMe crystal structure reversible upon solvent removal?
What is the main difference between kgmSMe and kgmOMe regarding their synthesis conditions?
data.answer: The main difference is the use of 5-methylthioisophthalic acid (SMe-H2ip) for kgmSMe and 5-methoxyisophthalic acid (OMe-H2ip) for kgmOMe.

data.question: What is the effect of THF vapor on kgmSMe?
data.answer: It causes interlayer expansion of kgmSMe.

data.question: Can kgmOMe undergo interlayer expansion in all solvents listed in the synthesis section?
What is the significance of the SQUEEZE command in the context of the crystallographic analysis?
data.answer: It is used for the structure refinement to account for severely disordered guest solvent molecules.

data.question: What is the observed color change of kgmSMe upon exposure to THF vapor?
Is the synthesis of 5-methylthioisophthalic acid (SMe-H2ip) a part of the kgmSMe synthesis process?
What analytical technique was used to obtain the diffuse reflectance spectra of as-synthesized kgmSMe and kgmOMe?
What is the role of the Hansen solubility parameters in the context of solvent effects on kgmSMe expansion?
data.answer: They were examined to correlate with the observed interlayer expansion profiles of kgmSMe.
